title: Glory and fame
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Social interaction in youth
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Social interaction in youth
Hobbies, Recreation & Sport/Football players - Australia - Biography
abstract: One girl's family and her football club.
description: Ayesha Lai came from a big family from many different cultures. But one thing her family shared is their love for Australian Rules football. Ayesha tells of how she developed her passion for the game, through her brothers and reading about the great Indigenous footballers who played for Essendon. Eventually she threw her support behind the club, which culminated in meeting and talking with Kevin Sheedy.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001927; Western stories : expressions for the future : Digital Storytelling project; To be Catalogued; 2009
